definitions.text: (used of conduct or character) deserving or bringing disgrace or shame; - Rachel Carson
examples: Man...has written one of his blackest records as a destroyer on the oceanic islands
an opprobrious monument to human greed

definitions.text: giving offense to moral sensibilities and injurious to reputation; ; - Thackeray
examples: the wicked rascally shameful conduct of the bankrupt
the most shocking book of its time
